text: The 2003 Pan American Women's Handball Championship was the seventh edition of the Pan American Women's Handball Championship, held in Brazil from 29 April to 4 May 2003. It acted as the American qualifying tournament for the 2003 World Women's Handball Championship. ==Preliminary round== All times are local (UTC−3). ===Group A=== \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- ==Knockout stage== ===Bracket=== ===Semifinals=== \---- ===Seventh place game=== ===Fifth place game=== ===Third place game=== ===Final=== ==Final ranking== {| class="infobox bordered" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2003 World Championship |} {| class="wikitable" !Rank !Team |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:gold medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:silver medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:bronze medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|4|| |- |align=center|5|| |- |align=center|6|| |- |align=center|7|| |} ==External links== *Results on todor66.com 2003 Women American Women's Handball Championship Pan Category:2003 in Brazilian women's sport Category:April 2003 sports events in South America Category:May 2003 sports events
